Package phonegame

Interface Summary
IAlarmListener Use this interface if you want to receive timer/alarm events
IMenuListener Use this interface if you want to receive menu events
IStepListener Use this interface if you want to receive step events
 

Class Summary
GameDashboard This class visually represents the "dashboard" in you game.
GameEngine The GameEngine forms the core of the game by controlling the gameloop and the painting operations.
GameForm This class allows you to easily create input forms on which you can add various GUI widgets (textboxes, etc).
GameItem class GameItem represents an actor in the game that is not moving.
GamePersistence This class provides access to the persistence layer of the phone.
GamePlayer This class represents the player figure in the game.
GameSound This class features a number of static methods that can be used to add sound to your game.
MoveableGameItem Class MoveableGameItem represents a moveable actor in the game.
 

Exception Summary
GameException Custom exception class to handle exceptions thrown by the GameAPI.
